description.ko: 네온의 비가 다가올 미래의 크롬 지평선과 만나는, 금속적 낭만이 머무는 찰나.
description.en: A suspended moment of metallic romance, where neon rain meets the chrome horizon of a future yet to come.

prompt: A high-altitude cinematic view of a maglev station suspended between two chrome skyscrapers in a rain-slicked cyberpunk metropolis. Intricate futuristic textures of brushed metal and wet glass reflect vibrant neon pink (#FF00FF) and cyan (#00FFFF) light. Volumetric neon smog fills the gaps between buildings, illuminated by global illumination from massive holographic displays. 8k, Octane Render, hyper-realistic fluid dynamics on the glass surfaces. The lighting is cinematic and moody, capturing the digital romance of a city that never sleeps, with sharp focus on the glowing maglev tracks.
